author: brett
msg: allow a plugin to specify the minimum Maven version (will apply for both building and its execution - this should be separated later).
If you are running an older version then it will not prompt to update when found, and will fail if it is encountered with a hardcoded version.

author: clr
msg: Improve handling of getPersistenceManagerFactory; add test cases for error conditions

author: clr
msg: JDO-95 if Currency.class is not available, don't test or create helper instances for Currency

author: ammulder
msg: - GBeanInfo remembers interfaces passed to addInterface
- ProxyManager can create a proxy for interfaces based on GBeanInfo
JMXProxyManager now much much smaller (extends BasicProxyManager)

author: trustin
msg: * Added acquireThreadId and releaseThreadId methods to manage threadIds.
* Added threadNamePrefix property and its getter.
